title: *** Monthly Furnished Rentals ***
posting_body: Fully furnished rentals in Summerlin, Henderson, the Strip, Spring Valley, Southern Highlands, UNLV, and Seven Hills!
Starting at $75 a night all inclusive corporate relocation, short term, vacation, student housing/rentals!
Perfect for travel professionals, travel nurses, flood, fire, and mold victims, intern students and vacationers.
All utilities, housewares, linens, WiFi, and TV streaming service included with your stay.
Available for short-term or long-term leases (30 day minimum).
Contact Hayley at regarding showings and qualifications for tenants.
Location address is our office Housing Helpers
